```{r results='asis'}

showtable <- function(df,caption){
  knitr::kable(df,format="markdown",caption = caption)
}

bangumi <-unique(df$bangumi)

for (bgm in bangumi){


  subdf <- df %>% filter(bangumi == bgm) %>% select(server_filename,year4) %>% rename("番组"=server_filename,"播出时间"=year4)
  
  print(showtable(subdf,bgm))
}
```
